TEI.2.document_title: Asa Brigham to James F Perry, 09-22-1835

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 132

div1.p: at the request of Mr. J. H. Bell, I enclose you a copy of a letter writen by Col. S. F. Austin to P. W. Grayson of this place; and should have sent you a copy of the Cols, circular, if time would have permited.— I have sent a copy to the Committee of safety, at Velasco, of which you are a member, and one to Brazoria, for publication.— I shall leave tomorrow for Matagorda, on business, but shall return before Monday the 5th of next month, at which time I wish to have a meeting of the Ayuntamiento; you will please attend.—
